game.name: Halloween Candy Vs Vampire Style
game.description:
Halloween celebration has just hit every home today! Two cute and popular Disney princesses Anna and Elsa are crazy to celebrate this mystery festival at their home. This year they have planned to enjoy the celebration in different style. It will be amazing to see princesses helping children to ask for the candies. Before doing anything else, you need to help them to pick up the nice outfits. Will you provide your helping hands to these cuties? Join Halloween Candy Vs Vampire Style game to guide princess prepare in two different styles!
Their final look will decide that which princess will get more candies in this brand new dressing game for girls. Give your first princess a red top with a skeleton design and a matching red skirt or choose a black color short frock with some cool spooky design or dress her up with a red and black outfit hanging below the knees! Combine her dress with a pair of matching gloves, a lovely hairstyle and a suitable spooky hair band in this html5 princess dress up game! Do not forget to give her a fine legging, a pair of sandals and elegant wings!
Once you are done on the dressing part of the first princess, get ready to help the second princess to pick up a perfect party for the Halloween party. Do not forget to give her a lovely toy in her hand. Prepare their basket in the end to make sure that both the princesses can collect their candies in this one of the best Halloween games for kids! Check out more princess dress-up games on atmegame.com for free and have fun, no download required!
